text: Tollius is a genus of broad-headed bugs in the family Alydidae. There are at least four described species in Tollius. ==Species== These four species belong to the genus Tollius: * Tollius curtulus (Stål, 1859) * Tollius quadratus Van Duzee, 1921 * Tollius setosus Van Duzee, 1906 * Tollius vanduzeei Torre-Bueno, 1940 ==References== Category:Alydinae Category:Pentatomomorpha genera
title: Tollius (bug)
